noun.description: The process of coming into view or becoming exposed after being concealed.
examples: I misjudged the timing of my emergence

noun.description: The process of coming into being, or of becoming important or prominent.
examples: the emergence of the environmental movement
Japan's emergence as a modern state

origin: Mid 17th century (in the sense unforeseen occurrence): from medieval Latin emergentia, from Latin emergere bring to light (see emerge).
